name: PIZZAPLEX VHS // Security Breach Arcade
description:
The truth will set them free.

In this series of minigames based on Nick Carlson Press's notorious Reimagining Security Breach, play as Gregory within the depths of his nightmares, to uncover the tragic fates of the missing children at Freddy Fazbear's Mega Pizzaplex. Enjoy this darker take on the events of Five Nights at Freddy's: Security Breach, with four levels and hidden secrets to unlock.


REIMIAGINING SECURITY BREACH VIDEO (TW: GRAPHIC CONTENT)
